body_html:
I encountered the same error too. I have tried to close all TensorArrays but it didn't help. I finally solved this problem by setting parallel_iterations=1 in the while_loop.

I still don't know how this problem appears after found this in the document about tf.while_loop:

For correct programs, while_loop should return the same result for any parallel_iterations > 0.

and this in the c++ implementation.

The dynamic_size is indeed true and I suspect there is a bug in the while_loop parallelism..

body:
I encountered the same error too.  I have tried to close all TensorArrays but it didn't help. I finally solved this problem by setting parallel_iterations=1 in the while_loop.

I still don't know how this problem appears after found this in the [document about tf.while_loop](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/while_loop):
> For correct programs, while_loop should return the same result for any parallel_iterations > 0.

and this in the[ c++ implementation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/7bcbcc1392516a2b2d7a7abae2ccce7091c8dae3/tensorflow/core/kernels/tensor_array.h#L449).

The dynamic_size is indeed true and I suspect there is a bug in the while_loop parallelism..
